item.title: Aidenpants add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Aidenpants add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Aidenpants add a quote by Carolyn G. Heilbrun
item.description: "We women have lived too much with closure: "If he notices me, if I marry him, if I get into college, if I get this work accepted, if I get this job" -- there always seems to loom the possibility of something being over, settled, sweeping clear the way for contentment. This is the delusion of a passive life. When the hope for closure is abandoned, when there is an end to fantasy, adventure for women will begin." -- Carolyn G. Heilbrun

item.title: Aidenpants add a quote by Alan Cohen
item.description: "It takes a lot of courage to release the familiar and seemingly secure, to embrace the new. But there is no real security in what is no longer meaningful." -- Alan Cohen
